attributes.action: Abolish Inheritance  tax in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
1. Double or Triple Taxation of the Same Income:
   Inheritance tax represents an additional layer of taxation on wealth that has already been subjected to income tax, capital gains tax.

2. Disincentive to Work Hard and Save:
   The imposition of inheritance tax disincentivizes individuals from working hard and saving for their future, knowing that a significant portion of their wealth will be taxed upon their death. 

3. Stress on Survivors:
   Bereaved families are often forced to navigate complex and stressful tax affairs during a time of grief. 

4. Erosion of Innovation and Economic Growth:
   The inheritance tax reduces the incentive for individuals to invest in businesses and innovative ventures.
attributes.background: Abolish inheritance tax in the United Kingdom for everybody
